info.name: Noir
info.description: Tired of Super Mario World Central's boring old default look? This theme is to update SMWC's look and give it a more modern, stylish, up-to-date design.
info.additionalInfo:
Release notes: v1.1.1 - July 22, 2016
  • Bugfix
v1.1.0 - July 22, 2016
  • Updated theme to support SMWC's current classes
  • Made visual improvements
  • Added basic support for SMWC+
v1.0.1 - December 21, 2014
  • Fixed blurry fonts on Google Chrome and Opera
v1.0 - December 20, 2014
  • Initial Release
